technology.name: Way of Scrying
technology.description: Tzeentch listens. Tzeentch sees. Tzeentch knows.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Reveal Faction Intentions"

technology.name: Way of Prognostication
technology.description: Only a fool believes they make their own choices. The Great Conspirator has known their mind since the moment of their creation.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Open Gates"

technology.name: Word Seeker
technology.description: Knowledge is both source and fuel for the Raven God's timeless, limitless power. Thus, there must always be more knowledge.

effects.description: Construction time: -1 for Library buildings

technology.name: Piercing Screams
technology.description: The sound is a chilling howl from the void, a siren song of madness that strips reason from even the strongest mind.

effects.description: Enables charmed attacks for Screamers of Tzeentch
Charge bonus: +8 for Screamers of Tzeentch units
Missile resistance: 5% for Screamers of Tzeentch units

technology.name: Blinding Iridescent
technology.description: Horrors are wildly unstable by nature, caught only in a brief dalliance with existence, but the correct incantations may bind them to greater corporeality.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +3 for Iridescent Horrors

technology.name: Endless Mutation
technology.description: Howling mania. Writhing tendrils. An abundance of warped limbs. Gift upon gift upon unbearable gift, by the grace of the Changer.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +8% for Forsaken of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units
Charge bonus: +5 for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units

technology.name: Fluxion Constructs
technology.description: Magic is matter, and matter is magic. Both, behind the vaunted but illusory rules of reality, are in a constant state of glorious flux.

effects.description: Construction cost: -8% for Province Capital/Settlement buildings

technology.name: Way of Fate
technology.description: The iridescent waters of the Well of Eternity reveal all to Tzeentch's patient gaze.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Give War Co-ordination Target"

technology.name: Exalted Locus of Conjuration
technology.description: The witless mortals call it 'magic'. Here is the truth of the matter: this great energy is Change itself given eldritch form, and Tzeentch decrees to whom it is allocated.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
Ammunition: +30% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units

technology.name: Thaumatic Locus
technology.description: The Winds of Magic shift through a fountain of indescribable colours as, somewhere far beyond, the Raven laughs.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +20
	(all armies)

technology.name: Fires of Change
technology.description: To remain in stasis is a fate worse than even the cruellest death. Praise the Architect of Fate, for He brings blessed change – and not a moment too soon.

effects.description: Number of uses: +1 for bound spells on Lord of Change units

technology.name: Cult Whisperer
technology.description: The mind is the one true battlefield. Only by luring more mortals to His ineffable cause can Lord Tzeentch prevail in the Great Game.

effects.description:
Tzeentch corruption: +1
	(all Cultist Heroes)

Spread Corruption action: Tzeentch corruption is increased by an additional 1
	(all Cultist Heroes)
Growth: +10

technology.name: Stannic Deviance
technology.description: Let dull metal become lustrous gold. For the Changer of Ways, this requires only a thought.

effects.description: Lord and Hero recruit rank: +2 for Lore of Metal casters
Income from all buildings: +3%

technology.name: Temporal Switch
technology.description: All of this has happened before, and all of this shall happen again and again. Only Tzeentch decides the when.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Break Alliance"

technology.name: Locus of Contrivance
technology.description: The honour of serving The Great Schemer's eternal, ineffable will is both wage and fuel for His shrieking legion of change.

effects.description: Upkeep: -3%
Spell resistance: 30% for Forsaken of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units

technology.name: Champions of Change
technology.description: Hail the writhing fire of change! All glory to the true nature of Chaos!

effects.description: Lord recruit rank: +3

technology.name: Eye Collecting
technology.description: Should one refuse to open their eyes to truth, it is only right that they should be parted from them.

effects.description: Income from raiding: +30%

technology.name: Bolt of Change
technology.description: Such power there is in words. Power that belongs only to the Raven God.

effects.description:
Army ability: "Bolt of Change"
	(all armies)

technology.name: Glean Magic
technology.description: All knowledge belongs to the Bringer of Change, and he will reclaim it at will.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Glean Magic" for Lord of Change units

technology.name: Arcane Surge
technology.description: To look upon the standard of Tzeentch, crawling with eldritch, multi-hued symbols and tempestuous energies, is to look upon madness writ in living cloth.

effects.description:
Cooldown: -10% to Lore of Tzeentch and Metal spells
	(all armies)

technology.name: Teleport
technology.description: The puppeteering of space and time is accompanied by the acrid-sweet smell of burning reality, and the sense of something serpentine tunnelling through one's mind.

effects.description: Teleport stance usage cost: -100% Winds of Magic

technology.name: Secret of Chrysopeia
technology.description: Once sufficient raw material is seized in the name of the Great Sorcerer, it is but child's play to transmute its essence into materials of great value.

effects.description: Income from sacking and looting settlements: +15%

technology.name: Metallurgical Morphism
technology.description: Which caused which – the writhing, sanity-stripping runes or the unnaturally shifting steel that bears them? Only Tzeentch knows.

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Chosen of Tzeentch and Chaos Knights of Tzeentch units
Charge bonus: +5% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch and Doom Knights of Tzeentch units

technology.name: Storm of Fire
technology.description: Blue and gold are His colours. Nine is His number. The Raven is His totem. Infinite is His knowledge.

effects.description:
Army ability: "Storm of Fire"
	(all armies)

technology.name: The Architect’s Chosen
technology.description: Deep within the Crystal Labyrinth, the Weaver of Fates pulls at the strings of time. Thus do his myriad servants grow in strength and wisdom at unnatural pace.

effects.description: Lord recruit rank: +3

technology.name: Inscrutable Demagoguery
technology.description: Ancient knowledge, arcane deceptions and the exquisite gift of insanity: to His most faithful, Tzeentch bestows Ruinous blessings.

effects.description: Hero action success chance: +10% for Cultists

technology.name: Infernal Gateway
technology.description: None can resist the portal's whispered call – but all consumed by it will proceed on their way to oblivion.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Infernal Gateway" for Lord of Change units

technology.name: Iridescent Touch
technology.description: The Raven's light dances across flesh – and then through it, illuminating it with cascades of indescribable colour from within. In this way, existence is revealed as illusion.

effects.description:
Tzeentch corruption: +3
	(all provinces)

technology.name: Transmutation of Ore
technology.description: Ask miracles of the Impossible Fortress and ye shall receive. For what is wealth to Tzeentch but a whisper upon the breeze?

effects.description: Income from Settlement buildings: +10%

technology.name: Way of Deceit
technology.description: The Changer of Ways sees the secret hatred within, the simmering greed behind the mask of friendship. That is how He makes puppets of us all.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Force Rebellion"

technology.name: Gift of Mutation
technology.description: Most believe that mutation is random, but the faithful know that Tzeentch's instructions for how the flesh will one day warp are inscribed upon the very fibres of one's being.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -4%
Armour: +6 for Marauders of Tzeentch and Marauder Horsemen of Tzeentch units
Charge bonus: +5 for Forsaken of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch and Spawn of Tzeentch units

technology.name: Way of Deception
technology.description: Vision is illusion. In this, we are all of us but the puppets of Tzeeneth, and he severs and re-ties our strings at will.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Reveal Shroud"

technology.name: Locus of Transmogrification
technology.description: The flesh writhes and warps, taking on ever-changing, disorientating new forms most minds cannot focus on, seeming even to spasm in and out of existence.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1 for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
Melee defence: +4 for Marauders of Tzeentch, Chaos Warriors of Tzeentch, Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units

technology.name: Way of Time
technology.description: Time is but a mirage, a self-deception employed by mortals to impose order upon madness. Should the Changer will it this futile illusion may be dispelled.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Track Army"

technology.name: Treason of Tzeentch
technology.description: Whispering doubt. Hissing mistrust. Murmured envy. The Great Conspirator's dark will makes a mockery of allegiance, courage and friendship alike.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Treason of Tzeentch" for Lord of Change units

technology.name: Awaken the Sleeper
technology.description: Deception is its own reward. Come what may, the Weaver of Fates rejoices when a long-planned scheme is at last revealed.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +3 for Cultists

technology.name: Tzeentch’s Firestorm
technology.description: A kaleidoscope of blazing colour, hypnotic in its majesty. Before those engulfed by it are reduced to ashes, they will witness the truth.

effects.description: Bound spell: "Tzeentch's Firestorm" for Lord of Change units

technology.name: Warpflame Formulae
technology.description: Searing scarlet, blinding blue, glorious gold: these are the writhing colours of Tzeentch's uncanny balefire.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Flamers of Tzeentch and Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
Melee defence: +4 for Flamers of Tzeentch and Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units
Missile strength: +5% for Flamers of Tzeentch and Exalted Flamer of Tzeentch units

technology.name: Greater Locus of Change
technology.description: The squealing giggle of a single Horror can shred mortal minds to ribbons. This is why great Tzeentch provides an ever-swelling legion of these Whirling Destroyers.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -5% for Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
Passive ability: "Arcane Mirth" for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch and Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units
Speed: +5% for Blue Horrors of Tzeentch, Pink Horrors of Tzeentch and Exalted Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units

technology.name: Pestilent Hatred
technology.description: The Fool God Nurgle, and his flat circles of unchanging time. Let there be disruption! Let there be Change!

effects.description: Chance of a plague spreading: -20%
Leadership: +5 when fighting against Nurglish factions
Melee attack: +4 when fighting against Nurglish factions

technology.name: Persistent Change
technology.description: Only by Tzeentch's will do any of us draw breath. Due gratitude must be shown.

effects.description: Control: +2

technology.name: Scatter Loci
technology.description: The unseen Mark of Tzeentch is inscribed upon every stone in every land, for this is His design. To those granted the Raven's sight, the bounties are great indeed.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +5%

Local recruitment capacity: +1
	(all provinces)

technology.name: Way of War
technology.description: Bony knuckles inside the brain, kneading, coaxing, enraging – stoking eternal hatred.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Force War"

technology.name: Way of Manipulation
technology.description: From the shadows, He watches. He sees the darkness behind the lies. He pulls at unseen strings, and summons forth tumult and turmoil.

effects.description: Changing of the Ways: "Halt Faction"

technology.name: Disc Taming
technology.description: From the forbidden tomes of Tzeentch, a fresh incantation to pluck a Shrieking Skyray from the heavens and bind it to His servitor's will.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -8% for Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
Recruit rank: +1 for Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
Weapon strength: +4% for Chaos Knights of Tzeentch and Doom Knights of Tzeentch units
